item.title: 罗氏因肥胖症药物副作用数据引发担忧而下跌
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）股价下跌，原因是一张海报强调了该瑞士制药公司实验性肥胖症药物早期研究的副作用。【原文：Shares of Roche Holding AG fell after a poster highlighted side effects in an early-stage study of the Swiss pharmaceutical company’s experimental obesity medicine.】

item.title: 中国调查倾销行为，加拿大油菜籽库存创四年新高
item.description: 加拿大的油菜籽堆积如山，在中国启动反倾销调查后，供应量只会增加。【原文：Canola is piling up in Canada, with supplies only set to grow after China kicked off an anti-dumping investigation.】

item.title: KKR 的 Agrawal 称工业基础设施是 "下一件大事
item.description: KKR & Co.的全球基础设施主管表示，该资产类别的 "下一件大事 "是仓储设施和物流等工业资产。【原文：KKR & Co.’s global infrastructure head said the “next big thing” in the asset class is industrial assets such as storage facilities and logistics.】

item.title: CVC向德国铁路公司官员提出申克竞购申请
item.description: CVC Capital Partners Plc 正在向德国国有运输集团的高层发出新的呼吁，为其对德国铁路股份公司（Deutsche Bahn AG）物流部门德铁信可公司（DB Schenker）的收购出谋划策。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is pressing the case for its takeover bid for Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics arm DB Schenker with a fresh appeal to top officials at the German state-owned transport group.】

item.title: OpenAI 和茁壮资本支持成立六个月的人工智能药物发现初创公司
item.description: 半年前成立的人工智能生物学初创公司 Chai Discovery 已从重量级投资机构 Thrive Capital 和 OpenAI 募集了近 3000 万美元，用于将人工智能引入药物发现领域。【原文：Chai Discovery, an artificial intelligence biology startup founded six months ago, has raised nearly $30 million from heavyweights Thrive Capital and OpenAI to bring AI to drug discovery.】

item.title: 10 亿美元加密货币 "摩天大楼 "计划的投资者将获得赔偿
item.description: 据得克萨斯州证券委员会称，得克萨斯州和其他四个州已与一个涉嫌非法加密货币投资计划的运营商达成和解，该计划的亮点是代币化的摩天大楼部分所有权，涉案金额达 10 亿美元。【原文：Texas and four other states have reached a settlement with operators of an alleged $1 billion illegal cryptocurrency investment scheme highlighted by tokenized partial ownership of a skyscraper, according to the Texas State Securities Board.】

item.title: 政治动荡影响法国经济增长
item.description: Insee 表示，由于消费需求仅略有回升，而受政治不确定性影响的企业继续抑制投资，法国下半年的平均经济增长将是温和的。【原文：France’s economic growth will be modest on average in the second half of the year as consumer demand picks up only slightly and businesses rattled by political uncertainty continue to hold back on investment, Insee said.】

item.title: 法国小麦运往纽约，美国面粉厂继续进口
item.description: 尽管法国小麦收成惨淡，但法国小麦正运往纽约，这表明美国面粉厂在当地产量连年下降后，将继续利用欧洲的供应。【原文：French wheat is headed to New York despite the country’s disastrous harvest, a sign that American flour mills will continue to tap European supplies after years of declines in local production.】

item.title: 核监察机构将在乌克兰事故中指明肇事者姓名
item.description: 驻扎在俄罗斯占领的乌克兰核电厂的国际监测员说，他们能够对任何可能导致放射性紧急情况的事故进行归咎。【原文：International monitors stationed at a Russian-occupied nuclear power plant in Ukraine said they’d be able to assign blame for any potential accident resulting in a radiological emergency.】

item.title: 实录：美国贸易代表戴志康解释对华贸易新方式
item.description:
戴凯琳大使谈新贸易方式背后的思考。【原文：

Ambassador Katherine Tai on the thinking behind a new trade approach.

】

item.title: 铜矿商在中国交易失败后寻求退出加拿大市场
item.description: 总部位于温哥华的铜矿开采商 Solaris Resources Inc. 因加拿大冗长的审查程序而放弃了与一家中国投资者的融资交易，数月后，该公司正将其总部迁往厄瓜多尔首都。【原文：Vancouver-based copper miner Solaris Resources Inc. is relocating its headquarters to Ecuador’s capital, months after scrapping a financing deal with a Chinese investor due to a lengthy Canadian review process.】

item.title: 世贸组织警告各国保护主义可能扩大贫富差距
item.description: 世界贸易组织敦促各国政府抵制关税和其他国际商业壁垒，认为保护主义有可能使三十年来在缩小贫富差距方面取得的前所未有的进展付诸东流。【原文：The World Trade Organization urged governments to resist tariffs and other barriers to international commerce, arguing that protectionism risks undoing three decades of unprecedented progress in narrowing the gap between rich and poor nations.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘用加西亚-萨拉斯和雷德蒙德负责中型企业银行业务
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）从竞争对手格林希尔（Greenhill & Co.）和古根海姆（Guggenheim）聘请了银行家，以加强其覆盖美国中型企业的顾问团队。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has hired bankers from rivals Greenhill & Co. and Guggenheim to boost its team of advisers covering mid-sized companies in the US.】

item.title: 美国政府问责局称，RTX 长期拖延的 70 亿美元 GPS 跟踪网络仍有问题
item.description: 美国国会审计员周一表示，经过多年的拖延和成本增长，RTX 公司耗资 76 亿美元建造的用于控制 GPS 卫星的地面网络离计划交付时间还有一个月，但该网络仍存在许多问题，可能会进一步阻碍美国太空部队对其的验收。【原文：A month before its planned delivery after years of delay and cost growth, RTX Corp.’s $7.6 billion ground network to control GPS satellites is still marred by problems that may further stall its acceptance by the US Space Force, congressional auditors said Monday.】

item.title: 阿波罗支持的软件制造商 Edgio 寻求破产保护
item.description: 由私募股权巨头阿波罗管理公司（Apollo Management）支持的 Edgio 公司已于周一在特拉华州申请破产保护。【原文：Edgio Inc., which is backed by private equity giant Apollo Management, has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection on Monday in Delaware.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克（GSK）药物在高级研究中有助于预防严重哮喘发作
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）的实验性药物在两项后期研究中帮助预防了严重的哮喘发作，为该药物的发展铺平了道路，该英国公司称这种药物的年销售额可达 30 亿英镑（39 亿美元）。【原文：GSK Plc’s experimental drug helped prevent serious asthma attacks in two late-stage studies, easing the path forward for a medicine that the British company says could reach £3 billion ($3.9 billion) in annual sales.】

item.title: Starboard 推动终止新闻集团的双层结构
item.description: Starboard Value LP 正在推动新闻集团取消双层股权结构，并准备在该媒体公司拒绝参与时对其采取进一步行动。【原文：Starboard Value LP is pushing News Corp. to eliminate its dual-class share structure and is prepared to take further action against the media company if it refuses to engage.】

item.title: 甲骨文云的增长可能成为华尔街下一个人工智能宠儿
item.description: 云计算是最早受到人工智能明显推动的行业之一。甲骨文公司周一发布的季度财报可能会延续这一趋势。【原文：Cloud computing has been one of the first industries to get a demonstrable boost from artificial intelligence. Oracle Corp.’s quarterly results on Monday are likely to extend that trend.】

item.title: KeyCorp 出售 70 亿美元证券以充实资产负债表
item.description: KeyCorp 出售了约 70 亿美元的低收益投资证券，因为该银行在经历了去年的地区银行动荡期后，正在努力重组其资产负债表。【原文：KeyCorp sold about $7 billion of low-yielding investment securities, as the bank works to restructure its balance sheet following a period of regional bank tumult last year.】

item.title: Audible 将开始生成部分有声读物讲述人的人工智能语音复制品
item.description:
有声读物服务正在邀请一些美国解说员对他们的声音进行人工智能训练

。【原文：

The audiobook service is inviting some US-based narrators to train artificial intelligence on their voices

】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "星际链路 "获得许可后开始在津巴布韦运营
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链 "公司（Starlink）在获得当局许可批准四个月后，开始在津巴布韦提供高速互联网服务。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink began offering its high-speed internet service in Zimbabwe, four months after it was granted licensing approval by authorities.】

item.title: 德拉吉为欧盟跨境征收碳税的计划标示风险
item.description: 欧洲央行前行长马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）表示，欧洲对进口碳排放定价的大胆计划存在风险，可能会导致其无效。【原文：Europe’s bold plan to put a price on imported carbon emissions carries risks that may render it ineffective, according to former European Central Bank president Mario Draghi.】

item.title: Northvolt 将暂停部分生产并裁员以应对电动汽车市场低迷
item.description: 瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 正在暂停其旗舰工厂的部分生产并裁员，以应对运营困难和电动汽车需求下降。【原文：Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB is pausing part of the production at its flagship factory and cutting the workforce to cope with operational difficulties and a drop in demand for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 墨西哥年度通胀率在墨西哥银行利率决定前放缓
item.description: 由于食品和能源价格飙升的势头减弱，墨西哥 8 月份的年度通胀率放缓幅度基本符合预期，这为央行本月考虑再次降息提供了更大的空间。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation slowed roughly in line with expectations in August as a spike in food and energy prices faded, giving the central bank more room to consider another interest rate cut this month.】

item.title: 投资者认为政治风险上升，斯里兰卡债务暴跌
item.description: 本周一，斯里兰卡美元债券的抛售加剧，原因是在本月晚些时候的选举之前，政治不确定性上升，投资者减少了对该国的投资。【原文：A selloff in Sri Lanka dollar bonds intensified on Monday as investors reduced their country exposure over rising political uncertainties before elections later this month.】

item.title: 世界上最古老的游击队重启对石油公司的战争
item.description: 哥伦比亚反叛分子对石油工业发动了新一轮的战争，一连串的输油管袭击导致原油流入河流，黑烟滚滚，直冲云霄。【原文：Colombian rebels have reopened their war on the oil industry with a wave of pipeline attacks that sent crude spilling into rivers and clouds of black smoke billowing into the sky.】

item.title: 谷歌的广告帝国受到抨击，美国反垄断审判即将开始
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌周一将重返法庭，面对美国司法部的指控，即谷歌操纵了价值 6770 亿美元的显示广告市场，违反了反垄断法。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google heads back to court Monday to face US Justice Department allegations that it manipulates the $677 billion display advertising market in violation of antitrust laws, just one month after losing a landmark ruling that it illegally dominates online search.】

item.title: 寒流来袭，法国电力需求增加
item.description: 随着欧洲各地气温骤降，法国的电力需求正攀升至数周以来的最高水平。【原文：French power demand is climbing to the highest level in weeks as temperatures plummet across Europe.】

item.title: 德国商业银行警告：特朗普主导美元的想法有可能适得其反
item.description: 根据德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）一位策略师的长期预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划在全球贸易中强制推行美元主导地位，这很有可能导致经济混乱，最终削弱美国货币。【原文：Donald Trump’s plan to force dollar dominance in global trade has a high risk of causing economic disruption that could ultimately weaken the US currency, according to a long-range scenario by a Commerzbank AG strategist.】

item.title: 习近平寻求与西班牙在人工智能和高科技发展方面建立更紧密的关系
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平对西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯说，他希望两国加强联系，共同推动人工智能和新能源等高科技产业的发展。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping told Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez he wants the two nations to strengthen ties and jointly promote development in high-tech industries, including artificial intelligence and new energy.】
